questionText: Does anyone in the household have any of these income situations?

questionAnswers.toolTip: One or more individuals currently have income from a job, or will start a job in the next 30 days (not including Self-Employment)
One or more individuals have stopped working at a job in the past 30 days
One or more individuals have income from self-employment or receive money from other sources
questionAnswers.accordionData:
Examples of other income include: 
 •	Alimomy
 •	Annuity
 •	Black Lung
 •	Cash Assistance
 •	Child Support
 •	Dividends/Interest
 •	Lottery and Gambling Winnings
 •	Payments from a Trust
 •	Pensions/Retirement
 •	Railroad Retirement
 •	Rental Income
 •	Self-Employment
 •	Social Security Disability
 •	Social Security Retirement
 •	Supplemental Security Income (SSI)
 •	Survivors of Disability Income (RSDI)
 •	Unemployment Benefits
 •	V.A Aid and Attendance
 •	Veterans Benefits
 •	Worker Compensation
